ygData.subject: Neriak Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok its not specifically a Necro topic but since probably more Dark elves hang around this email list than any other I figured I would ask here. I am currently
ygData.messageBody:
Ok its not specifically a Necro topic but since probably more Dark elves
hang around this email list than any other I figured I would ask here.

I am currently trying to raise my Dark Barginers Faction. Thats basically
Neriak Merchant faction. Its an easy thing to do if your a Dark elf, as
you can do some of the quests. Unfortunately I am a gnome (it has its
advantages (non kos in North Freeport)). However I don't currently have
enough Dark Barginers faction to do quests with them. I can still buy bank
and sell in Neriak but I am trying to get some better pricing.

Does anyone know of any Mobs that will provide a positive bonus to Dark
Barginers faction?

Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
